Title: Shell takes FID on Atlantic LNG backfill field in Trinidad and Tobago
Description: Shell Trinidad and Tobago has taken a final investment decision (FID) on the Aphrodite project, an undeveloped gas field in the East Coast Marine Area (ECMA) in Trinidad and Tobago.
Author: JS

Title: Completion of Hoegh Gandria’s FSRU conversion pegged for Q4 2026
Description: Finnish technology firm Wartsila has sealed a contract to supply a regasification module for Hoegh Evi’s conversion of the 160,000 m3 Hoegh Gandria LNG tanker, scheduled to be completed in the fourth quarter of 2026.
Author: JS

Title: Venture Global begins construction of CP2 following final federal green light
Description: Venture Global has started site work at the company’s 20 mtpa CP2 LNG export facility in Louisiana, after receiving final federal approval last month.
Author: JS

Title: BP deepens commitment in Azerbaijan with FID on Shah Deniz Phase 3
Description: BP has made a final investment decision (FID) on a $2.9 billion third-phase expansion of Azerbaijan’s Shah Deniz gas field, aiming to boost long-term gas output through a new offshore compression facility.
Author: JS
